Skill.Name: Summon Hellhounds
Skill.Lore: War Beast Summons forth Hellhounds from the underworld to attack his enemies.

Skill.Name: Battle Cry
Skill.Lore: War Beast lets out a mighty battle cry, adding bonus damage to himself and units under his command.

Skill.Name: Primal Rage
Skill.Lore: The War Beast builds his Primal Rage, increasing attack speed and attack damage of himself and units under his control.

Skill.Name: Metamorphosis
Skill.Lore: War Beast transforms into a Hellhound Lieutenant, gaining a larger health pool, a critical attack, and a speed boost.
